Class Connection.Monitor

java.lang.Object
MyGame.Services.PublisherService<Path>
MyGame.Services.Monitor<Path>
MyGame.Services.Connection.Monitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Publisher<Path>, Service
Enclosing class:
Connection
public static final class Connection.Monitor extends Monitor<Path>
A PublisherService that monitors a connection. When the connection is lost, publishes the connection path and stops itself.

It does so by having a FileMonitor that monitors the connection file, with a callback that updates the internal clock; and a timer that periodically checks how long it's been since the last update; if it's been too long, it means the connection is lost.

  • Constructor Details

    • Monitor

      public Monitor(Path connectionPath)
      Creates a connection monitor. Does not start until a callback is added.
      Parameters:
      connectionPath - path to the connection file

  • Method Details

    • poll

      void poll()
      Checks whether the connection is still active.

      If current time - last update time is larger than the scheduler's clock period plus a bit of buffer time, it means the connection is lost. In that case calls the callbacks with the connection path and stops the service.

      Specified by:
      poll in class Monitor<Path>
